args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- The general linear group GL(n, ‚Ñù) as the subtype of invertible (i.e. nonzero determinant)
square n √ó n real matrices. -/
def GL (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] := { A : Matrix n n ‚Ñù // Matrix.det A ‚â† 0 }

/-- GL(n, ‚Ñù) is a group under matrix multiplication. -/
instance group_GL (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Group (GL n) := by sorry
